title: What may Apple do to 5G that no other brand could? - Quora

response.answer_text: When presenting the iPhone 12, Apple said that it covered more 5G frequencies than any other smartphone on the market. Of course, other manufacturers are free to offer the same since there are no technical barriers for doing so, but for once Apple was first with this feature. One could also mention the fact that Apple offers the Smart Data Mode which saves battery power as it allows the phone to switch between 4G and 5G networks depending on whether 5G speed is actually needed, see iPhone 12 and 5G: All the answers to your questions about the super-fast connectivity.

By buying 5g phones you're subsidizing 5g networks. Only thing Apple can do with 5g is make internet faster in their phones. That's not just apple any phone with 5g is faster than phones with 4g network. There's nothing they can do with 5g other than making internet faster.
